version_description:
- Download iTunes free songs to your own playlist. (Note: YouTube Music is NOT available for download)
- Listen to music with your friends! An ALL-NEW Live Radio feature that lets you share your favorite music with other users and become the most popular host!
- Nickname change option available.
- Fixed prior bugs and problems to help improve music playback experience.
If you have any problems regarding MixerBox, please visit our MixerBox fan page. We will try to reply as soon as possible. Feel free to rate us and leave a comment, so we can better help you!

- Fixed prior bugs and problems to help improve music playback experience.

If you have any problems regarding MixerBox, please visit our MixerBox fan page. We will try to reply as soon as possible. Feel free to rate us and leave a comment, so we can better help you!

【Song search maintenance】
Currently the song search and other related functions are undergoing maintenance. Our engineers are urgently getting it fixed. Normal service will be resumed as soon as possible.
We apologize for any inconvenience, thank you for your understanding!

Update immediately to the newest version of MB3!
- NEW comment feature in “Feed” tab! You can now make comments on posts, YAYYY!
- Enhanced user interface
- Fixed prior bugs and new issues, including:
"Can’t connect to MixerBox" error message,
Search results getting stuck at 99%,
and continue improving music playback experience.
